Country Club in Naples, FL | Vineyards Country Club Skip to content About Careers Our Team Events Venue Wedding Venue Corporate Event Venue Corporate Golf Event Quinceañera Venue Charity Golf Tournament Club Experience Golf Racquet Center Dining Wellness Center & Spa Activities Naples Rehabilitative Services News & Blog News Blog Membership Contact Member Login About Careers Our Team Events Venue Wedding Venue Corporate Event Venue Corporate Golf Event Quinceañera Venue Charity Golf Tournament Club Experience Golf Racquet Center Dining Wellness Center & Spa Activities Naples Rehabilitative Services News & Blog News Blog Membership Contact Member Login A Luxurious and Relaxing Country Club Experience in Naples, Florida Vineyards Country Club delivers pristine amenities and unmatched hospitality Located in spectacular Naples, Florida, Vineyards Country Club is one of this city’s most unique and remarkable places. We serve as a home away from home for those seeking authentic connections in an environment of unsurpassed reputation and quality. Our door is always open to those who appreciate the best of everything and want to belong to a true legacy! Our country club experience will help you discover everything the wonderful city of Naples has to offer, all in a club setting. JOIN THE CLUB Country Club Amenities Vineyards Country Club offers an unparalleled lifestyle experience for those seeking the ultimate in leisure and refinement. With world-class amenities and a breathtaking natural setting, Vineyards provide a sanctuary of relaxation and recreation for our discerning members. From championship golf courses and state-of-the-art fitness centers to elegant dining establishments and lavish spa facilities, the amenities we offer are designed to cater to every whim and desire. Join us and explore the luxurious amenities at Vineyards Country Club. COUNTRY CLUB EXPERIENCE Private Golf Courses Full Golf Memberships are open to both residents and non-residents of the Vineyards community. Explore 36 holes of one of the finest private golf courses in the golf capital of the world, Naples. Daily accessible tee times are available for members with a 4- hour pace of play average per 18 holes. GOLF Weddings and Other Special Events The ultimate event destination in the heart of Naples, Florida, Vineyards Country Club provides an elegant setting to create lifelong memories with loved ones, friends, and guests. A newly renovated ballroom, grand dining room, and banquet rooms provide the perfect setting to host weddings, reunions, bat mitzvahs, quinceañeras, award galas, corporate meetings, and more. BOOK AN EVENT Wellness Center & Spa Located just moments from the clubhouse, a 15,000-square-foot Wellness Center and Spa offers a variety of resort-style amenities and services to promote overall wellbeing and social connection. Recently designated one of America’s Healthiest Clubs, the serene space provides central access to a top-of-the-line fitness center, five-star salon and spa, aquatic exercise, and a charming café for healthy dining. WELLNESS CENTER & SPA Distinguished Dining Experience When it comes to dining in style, few experiences can rival the elegance and sophistication of country club dining at Vineyards. From the exquisite decor to the impeccable service, the Vineyards Country Club experience is truly a feast for all the senses. Join us for both upscale and casual dining. DINING Country Club Activities and Events Are you ready to live life to the fullest in a tropical paradise? Vineyards Country Club provides activities for socializing and developing lasting relationships. We’re known for our tight-knit community where members can forge life-long friendships and business connections. By engaging in group activities, you have the chance to meet like-minded individuals with similar interests which can open doors to new opportunities. ACTIVITIES & EVENTS What People Say About Vineyards Country Club 4.7 266 Google Reviews Great place to host your private events. I attended plenty of events with women council and it was a blast ❤️ Amina Mokhtari in the last week We recently hosted a baby shower at the Vinyards country Club for my first grandchild. I can not say enough about this venue. From the first meeting with Abby to the very last minute of the event.. IT WAS PERFECT!! This was my first big event I have hosted and because it was for my first grandchild I really wanted it to be over the top beautiful.. Abby was such a pleasure to work with. She tolerated my millions of e-mails and my constant “can I come by” visits!!! She seriously has the patients of a saint. She continued to remind me of the wonderful team she works with and reassured me it was all going to be perfect. AND IT WAS!!!
I arrived early the day of, Donny our bartender was already there setting up.. what an awesome bartender! He actually helped me set up the dessert/candy bar, he was fabulous! We requested 2 specialty drinks and they were delicious. Then we met the servers Paula and Bildad.. so professional and friendly.. Every time  they saw me doing anything they were right there reminding me to allow them to do it. (Same for mom to be)
The food was wonderful as well.
EVERYONE I encountered in the hall way, reception area valet were professional and very friendly. NOT ONE PERSON I CAME  INTO CONTACT WITH DID NOT SAY HELLO TO ME! It was so refreshing.
Thank you to the entire staff especially Abby, Donnie, Paula and Bildad. You made this day so magical:) celine emerson a week ago We had our daughter's Sweet 16 at The Vineyards Country Club and it was AMAZING! The food was out of this world, not only delicious, but plated so beautifully you could honestly eat it with your eyes. The service was fantastic, and everything went so smoothly. A big shoutout to Demi Munar and her team! Demi was there the entire time, super responsive, and made sure every detail was perfect. She made the whole process stress-free and the night truly unforgettable. If you’re planning an event, I can’t recommend The Vineyards Country Club (and especially Demi and her team) enough! Gina Supp a week ago My husband and I got married here, and the second I went to the venue I knew this was where we were going to get married. Abigail was such a big help, and she made me so comfortable throughout the whole process. We never felt rushed or stressed trying to figure out things with this business. Thank you! Taylor Cupo a month ago Vineyards Country Club, thank you!

Our only daughter was turning 15, and hosting her fairly tail quinceañera (15th) was very important to us.
My wife looked at a couple venues, but felt most comfortable with Demi Munar and the Vineyards CC.
Now that it’s all over and we look back at that night, it was perfect. Everything went so smoothly. The location was beautiful, the food was delicious, and the staff, from waiters, bussers, to bartenders, were top notch! It was better than we had ever excepted.
Five stars & I would definitely recommend them for anyone looking to book for any type of function.
I will forever be grateful to Demi Munar & the staff at Vineyard Country Club, my daughter’s night was beautiful, thank you! J. Esteban Padilla 2 months ago A Landmark Location Founded in 1988, Vineyards Country Club is a private, family-owned, non-equity club in breathtaking Naples, Florida. This landmark destination offers a rich history and a longstanding reputation for integrity, exceptional service, and compassion. Private Golf Club Naples, Fl | Vineyards Country Club Skip to content About Careers Our Team Events Venue Wedding Venue Corporate Event Venue Corporate Golf Event Quinceañera Venue Charity Golf Tournament Club Experience Golf Racquet Center Dining Wellness Center & Spa Activities Naples Rehabilitative Services News & Blog News Blog Membership Contact Member Login About Careers Our Team Events Venue Wedding Venue Corporate Event Venue Corporate Golf Event Quinceañera Venue Charity Golf Tournament Club Experience Golf Racquet Center Dining Wellness Center & Spa Activities Naples Rehabilitative Services News & Blog News Blog Membership Contact Member Login A Pristine Private Golf Club in Naples, Florida Experience Championship Golf at Its Finest Designed by renowned architect Kipp Schulties, the North and South courses at our club offer two distinct 18-hole championship golf experiences, setting them apart from other courses in Naples. Both layouts are crafted with unique topography, sculpted bunkers, scenic bridges, and tranquil lakes. Whether you’re here for a leisurely round or to challenge your limits, our courses and practice facilities promise an all-around exceptional golfing experience. GOLF MEMBERSHIP Expansive Double-Wide Fairways Designed for an enjoyable and challenging round. Premium Turf Bimini Bermuda grass on tees, fairways, surrounds, and most of the rough; Tif Eagle greens for optimal playability. Walking-Friendly Course Afternoon walking permitted for a relaxed pace of play. Golf Programs Men’s and Ladies’ weekly leagues and clinics to improve your game. Golf Pro Shop Stocked with top equipment, apparel, and accessories. Practice Facilities 24-station driving range and a dedicated short-game area for chipping, putting, and sand bunker practice. Professional Golf Staff Led by a full-time Director of Golf, Tom Metzger, who’s been inducted into the PGA Hall of Fame, alongside experienced pros and teaching staff. Reciprocal Golf Program Available during the summer months for added variety. Annual Memorial Day Tournament Honoring our heroes through the annual Vineyards Folds of Honor Tournament. North Course We’ve enhanced the design of the course, featuring far more undulation and movement. Expanded yardage brings the North Course up to championship level, offering unique challenges with newly contoured fairways, larger greens and natural aesthetic elements such as stone cap walls, wood bridges and indigenous South Florida landscaping. The entire course has been re-turfed with Bimini Bermudagrass on tees, fairways and roughs, complemented by TifEagle greens for optimal playability and resilience. VIEW SCORECARD South Course Recently, renowned golf course architect Kipp Schulties completed the renovation of Vineyards’ 18-hole championship South golf course. As part of the renovation, bulkheads have been installed along many of the lakes, and extensive lengthening work have been completed, including the reconfiguration of the tenth and eighteenth holes. VIEW SCORECARD Our North Course is Under Renovation! VIEW UPDATES & TIMELINE 2025 Best Golf Course Renovation Finalist As the only course in Southwest Florida, public or private, to earn recognition in the national publication’s annual ranking, Vineyards Country Club’s North Course has been recognized with an honorable mention in Golf Inc. magazine’s 2025 Best Renovation of the Year awards, distinguishing it as one of the top course renovations in the country. Highlights of the renovation include: Expanded yardage and recontoured fairways Larger TifEagle greens for improved performance Aesthetic features such as stone cap walls, wood bridges and native landscaping Bimini Bermudagrass on tees, fairways and roughs Refurbished bunkers with Par Angle white sand A new Toro irrigation system and advanced drainage for water efficiency and stormwater management Recognition: Kipp Schulties (Architect), QGS Development (Construction) LEARN MORE “Best Golf Course to do Business” In the 12th annual “Best of Business” poll, Vineyards Country Club was honored as the “ Best Golf Course to do Business ” in 2024. This accolade signifies much more than just an attractive 18-hole layout or a well-manicured green; it reflects the club’s commitment to providing an exceptional experience tailored to business professionals and their needs. The club stands as a prime example of how a private golf club can successfully blend leisure with professional opportunities, making it a vital component of the Naples business landscape. Book your corporate golf event, today! BOOK YOUR EVENT A Vibrant Golf Community in Naples, Florida For many, golf is more than just a sport – it’s a lifestyle. And what better way to fully immerse yourself in this lifestyle than by joining a vibrant golf community? Whether you’re a beginner looking to improve your game or a seasoned pro seeking camaraderie and competition, being part of the Vineyards Country Club golf community can offer access to top-notch courses and facilities, to social events and networking opportunities, joining a golf community can enhance your overall golfing experience in ways you never imagined. GOLF MEMBERSHIP Vineyards Golf Leagues & Tournaments At Vineyards Country Club, both amateur and professional golfers can connect with fellow enthusiasts during competitive, team-based tournaments and regular league play. Each championship course is pristinely conditioned to provide the ultimate golfing experience for players of all levels. The three-day Procacci Cup Invitational is the premier Vineyards Country Club golf and social event of the season. The annual tournament takes place March 7th – March 9th. We’d love to see you for fun and festivities at the next Procacci Cup! GOLF SCHEDULE Junior Golf Programs Our exciting junior programs inspire the next generation of golfers. During the Summer, we offer various opportunities for kids to learn, play, and grow their passion for golf in a fun and supportive environment. Create lasting memories while helping your children pursue their golfing dreams. For more information and questions about junior programs and summer camp, please contact the Golf Pro Shop at (239) 353-0505. About | Vineyards Country Club Skip to content About Careers Our Team Events Venue Wedding Venue Corporate Event Venue Corporate Golf Event Quinceañera Venue Charity Golf Tournament Club Experience Golf Racquet Center Dining Wellness Center & Spa Activities Naples Rehabilitative Services News & Blog News Blog Membership Contact Member Login About Careers Our Team Events Venue Wedding Venue Corporate Event Venue Corporate Golf Event Quinceañera Venue Charity Golf Tournament Club Experience Golf Racquet Center Dining Wellness Center & Spa Activities Naples Rehabilitative Services News & Blog News Blog Membership Contact Member Login Belong to a True Legacy at Vineyards Country Club YOUR DESTINATION OF CHOICE FOR WELLNESS, LIFESTYLE AND HOSPITALITY Founded in 1988, Vineyards Country Club is a private, family-owned, nonequity club in breathtaking Naples, Florida. This landmark destination offers a rich history and longstanding reputation for integrity, exceptional service and compassion. One of the largest country clubs in Naples, Vineyards has earned numerous awards and accolades for its dedication to delivering an unmatched, timeless experience for golf, wellness, fine dining, social events and more. Both residents and non-residents are welcome to enjoy the club’s resort-style amenities. This includes two award-winning, 18-hole championship golf courses set against 300-acres of verdant greens. Laying the Foundation for a True Legacy Vineyards Country Club began as the dream of two brothers and successful businessmen, Joseph and Michael Procacci. After growing their family’s tomato business into one of the largest wholesale produce distributors in the world, the Procacci brothers founded the Vineyards Development Corporation with the vision of creating a community of lasting integrity in North Naples. As a result, the country club provided buyers with greater value from the start. More than three decades later, Vineyards Country Club remains debt-free, competitive and stable, offering a sustainable legacy that many local clubs simply cannot match. BECOME A MEMBER AT VINEYARDS COUNTRY CLUB! EXPLORE MEMBERSHIP Vineyards Country Club Awards & Accolades As a debt-free club, members do not pay assessments. The strong ownership of the Procacci family has ensured that Vineyards Country Club will maintain its legacy of stability and luxury for generations to come. Creating a community of lasting integrity inspired Vineyard’s creators to invest heavily in the community’s central feature, its award-winning country club. Vineyards Development Corp. broke ground on the country club in October 1986, with its completion in January 1988. One of the largest country clubs in Naples, more than 300 acres were dedicated to the club’s grounds and its clubhouse is a spacious 70,000 square feet. To keep the club fresh and competitive at the highest level, Vineyards Country Club has continued to expand and enhance its facilities over the years. Since its original construction, the club has completed three renovations. During its 30th year, the clubhouse received a total renovation and brand-new 15,000 square-foot state-of-the-art Wellness Center & Spa, delivering exceptional amenities and service to Vineyards members and their guests. 5X CONSECUTIVE WINNER PEOPLE’S CHOICE AWARD FOR BEST COUNTRY CLUB Naples Daily News WINNER SAND DOLLAR AWARD FOR THE WELLNESS CENTER & SPA Collier Building Industry Association WINNER FINALIST FOR BEST GOLF COURSE AND PICKLEBALL FACILITY Gulfshore Life Best of the Gulfshore WINNER GOLDEN PALM AWARD FOR EXCELLENCE South Florida Hospitality Industry Network HONOREE AND MEMBER AMERICA’ S HEALTHIEST CLUBS Prevo Health Solutions Industry Association PROJECT PARTNER BLUE ZONES PROJECT COMMUNITY Blue Zones Project® SILVER ADDY WINNER CONSUMER WEBSITE American Advertising Awards What People Say About Vineyards Country Club This place is gorgeous! A Timeless Country Club Wedding Experience | Vineyards Skip to content About Careers Our Team Events Venue Wedding Venue Corporate Event Venue Corporate Golf Event Quinceañera Venue Charity Golf Tournament Club Experience Golf Racquet Center Dining Wellness Center & Spa Activities Naples Rehabilitative Services News & Blog News Blog Membership Contact Member Login About Careers Our Team Events Venue Wedding Venue Corporate Event Venue Corporate Golf Event Quinceañera Venue Charity Golf Tournament Club Experience Golf Racquet Center Dining Wellness Center & Spa Activities Naples Rehabilitative Services News & Blog News Blog Membership Contact Member Login Home Blog Delivering a Timeless Country Club Wedding Experience Delivering a Timeless Country Club Wedding Experience January 13, 2025 Blog Imagine exchanging vows in a breathtaking setting, where elegance meets nature, all while creating lasting memories for you and your guests. Are you dreaming of a wedding that encapsulates classic charm and sophistication? Planning a wedding is no small feat, and for many, the ultimate venue choice can set the tone for the entire celebration. Country clubs offer a unique blend of picturesque landscapes, luxurious amenities, and impeccable service, making them a preferred choice for couples seeking a timeless experience. With sprawling grounds and elegant ballrooms, these venues have the ability to transform your wedding into the fairy tale you’ve always envisioned. Join us as we explore the key elements to consider, ensuring that your country club wedding not only meets but exceeds all your expectations for a truly unforgettable celebration. Exquisite Indoor and Outdoor Venues For many, a country club that offers both indoor and outdoor wedding venues presents a variety of compelling benefits. This flexibility not only enhances the experience for the couple and their guests but also ensures that the wedding day runs smoothly. Having both indoor and outdoor spaces allows couples to accommodate their guest list comfortably. An outdoor lawn can serve as an ideal space for larger gatherings, while the indoor venue offers a more intimate setting for smaller weddings. The juxtaposition of indoor and outdoor settings provides diverse backdrops for wedding photography. Couples can take advantage of beautifully landscaped outdoor areas as well as the elegant interiors of the country club, resulting in a stunning array of photographs that capture the day’s memories from multiple perspectives. Personalized Timeless Details A country club wedding offers a perfect backdrop for a blend of elegance, sophistication, and personal touches that reflect the couple’s unique style and story. Incorporating personalized timeless details into your wedding will not only enhance the aesthetic but also create a memorable experience for you and your guests. Custom Invitations and Stationery Begin with custom-designed invitations that reflect the theme and color palette of your wedding. Work with a designer to incorporate personalized motifs, such as monograms or illustrations of the country club venue. Consider including the following details: Timeline and location : Provide a small itinerary or map of the country club layout to give guests a sense of familiarity. Personal Touch : Add a handwritten note or a custom wax seal to make your invitations stand out. Custom Decor Incorporate elements that hold special meaning, such as: Family Heirlooms : Use vintage vases or candle holders passed down through generations. Photos of You : Display framed photographs from your journey together or of family members on their wedding days. Consider personalized place cards and menu cards. Use a sophisticated font and layout to maintain an elegant tone that fits the country club venue. Incorporate Family Traditions If you and your partner come from different cultural backgrounds, blend traditions into the ceremony and reception . This showcases your individual stories while fostering a sense of unity. Incorporate music, dances, or readings that have significance in your families, making it a celebratory blend of love and heritage. Elegant Send-Off Conclude your special day with a personalized send-off—a sparkler exit, a vintage car, or a horse-drawn carriage. Ensure that it reflects your personal style and leaves a lasting impression on your guests. As guests leave, hand them thoughtful thank-you cards or keepsakes to remember your union. How to Ensure Flawless Ambiance Embrace Venue’s Natural Beauty: Many country clubs boast breathtaking landscapes. Position your ceremony and reception to highlight these stunning views. Whether it’s a lakeside setting or manicured gardens, nature can provide an elegant backdrop. Harmonious Color Palette: Pick a color scheme that complements the venue’s decor. Soft pastels or classic shades like navy and gold can add a touch of sophistication without overpowering the natural beauty of the surroundings. Use flowers, linens, and table settings that align with your color palette. Aligning these elements will create a cohesive atmosphere throughout the celebration. Soft Lighting and Candles: Incorporate soft, warm lighting to create a romantic ambiance. Options like string lights, lanterns, or chandeliers can transform your space into a magical environment. Candles can add warmth and intimacy, especially for an evening wedding. Consider tea lights or pillar candles on tables, along staircases, and near focal points. Curate Your Sound: Select a mix of live music and a DJ that complements the mood you want to create. Start with softer tunes during the cocktail hour, transitioning into more upbeat songs for dancing later. If your country club is near water or surrounded by trees, take advantage of these natural sounds. They can enhance the tranquil feel of the setting, drawing guests into your environment. Coordinate with a Professional: A wedding planner experienced in country club weddings can help you navigate logistics and ensure everything aligns with your vision. They can be invaluable in managing vendors, timelines, and ambiance specifics. Stay in close contact with the country club’s event staff to ensure all your needs are met. They can offer suggestions on lighting, setup, and catering that can enhance your ambiance significantly. FAQs: Planning Your Timeless Country Club Wedding To help you navigate the process, we’ve compiled a list of frequently asked questions related to planning your country club wedding. What makes a country club an ideal wedding venue? Country clubs offer an elegant and serene atmosphere, often featuring beautiful landscaping, scenic golf courses, and well-maintained facilities. They also typically provide comprehensive services, including catering, event coordination, and accommodations, which can simplify wedding planning. How do I secure a country club for my wedding date? To secure a country club, contact their event coordinator to check availability for your desired date. Many venues book up quickly, especially during peak wedding season, so it’s advisable to reserve your date as soon as you can, paying attention to their deposit and contract policies. Can we customize the wedding package? Most country clubs offer customizable wedding packages, allowing couples to tailor elements such as menu options, decor, and entertainment. Be sure to discuss your preferences with the event coordinator to create the perfect package that reflects your vision. What should we consider regarding decor? Country clubs often have a sophisticated aesthetic, which can influence your decor choices. When planning, consider the venue’s existing color scheme, style, and layout. You may want to integrate elements that complement the country club ambiance while adding personal touches that reflect your style. Vineyards Country Club: A Timeless Wedding Venue When it comes to selecting the perfect venue for a wedding, the setting plays a crucial role in creating unforgettable memories. Vineyards Country Club stands out as a wedding destination that defies the test of time, offering an enchanting blend of natural beauty, sophisticated amenities, and exceptional service. Choosing Vineyards Country Club means selecting a venue that is not only memorable for the day but will be cherished for a lifetime. Contact us today to learn more about our venue options. About Vineyards Country Club Vineyards Country Club is a 1,400-acre private, non-equity master-planned golf and country club community open to both residents and non-residents for more than 30 years. The family-owned community, founded in 1988, is located just east of Interstate 75 between Pine Ridge and Vanderbilt Beach roads and includes 2,719 homes in 38 individual gated neighborhoods, a 70,000-square-foot clubhouse, and 450,000 square feet of commercial space. The award-winning Club has been enhanced through three renovations since its original construction, with no member assessments. The Club offers 36 holes of members-only championship golf; a new, 15,000 square-foot Wellness Center & Spa with technologically advanced fitness equipment, five-star spa, salt water lap pool, smoothie café, and salt room; Racquet Center with 12 Har-Tru lite tennis courts, three lite gel cushioned pickleball courts, three regulation lite bocce courts, and year-round scheduled play; formal and casual indoor and al fresco dining; banquet, reception, meeting and event facilities; and one of Naples’ most active club social calendars. For membership or residential information, call 239-353-1500 ,  or visit the community’s Administration Office, located at 400 Vineyards Blvd., Naples. Vineyards Country Club - Vineyards Country Club Dining Facilities, Wellness Center, Salon and Spa Reopen Skip to content About Careers Our Team Events Venue Wedding Venue Corporate Event Venue Corporate Golf Event Quinceañera Venue Charity Golf Tournament Club Experience Golf Racquet Center Dining Wellness Center & Spa Activities Naples Rehabilitative Services News & Blog News Blog Membership Contact Member Login About Careers Our Team Events Venue Wedding Venue Corporate Event Venue Corporate Golf Event Quinceañera Venue Charity Golf Tournament Club Experience Golf Racquet Center Dining Wellness Center & Spa Activities Naples Rehabilitative Services News & Blog News Blog Membership Contact Member Login Home Media In the News Vineyards Country Club Dining Facilities, Wellness Center, Salon and Spa Reopen Vineyards Country Club Dining Facilities, Wellness Center, Salon and Spa Reopen May 22, 2020 In the News Naples, Fla. (May 22, 2020) — In accordance with guidelines set forth in the second phase of Governor DeSantis’ Plan for Florida Recovery , Vineyards Country Club’s dining facilities, salon, spa and amenity areas are now open and available with social distancing measures both indoors and outdoors, limited indoor occupancy of no more than 50% and outdoor seating. The salon and spa, located within the community’s 15,000 square foot Wellness Center, is accepting reservations with limited available hours by appointment. “In keeping with our recent designation as one of America’s healthiest clubs through the Blue Zones Project®, we are taking every measure possible to ensure an environmentally healthy atmosphere conducive to maintaining lifelong wellness,” said Vineyards Country Club Chief Operating Officer Paul Malonson. “We’ve missed our residents and members over the last two months, and we are excited to share our newly-renovated club with everyone.” As a gesture of appreciation for Vineyards Country Club’s recent donation of more than 400 meals for its healthcare workers, NCH Healthcare System deployed its Xenex LightStrike™ Germ-Zapping™ Robot to disinfect Vineyards’ entire 70,000-square-foot clubhouse, including all kitchens, dining areas, administrative offices and lobby. The robot uses a commercial grade ultraviolet light to kill germs. According to Xenex, the LightStrike robot manufacturer, the machines destroy the COVID-19 virus in two minutes. The robot provides an additional layer of protection to complement the club’s stringent sanitation guidelines. All food and beverage staff members are exceeding Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) guidelines by wearing protective masks and gloves, cleaning and disinfecting all areas including frequently touched surfaces, especially between usages. Employees are continuously training to reinforce cleaning, sanitation and disinfection procedures. Members are strongly encouraged to call ahead for reservations. In addition to consistent reinforcement of sanitation initiatives, precautionary measures performed by the club’s management, staff and housekeeping teams include using an ionic air purifier multiple times daily to disinfect surfaces throughout the club, continuous sanitization to avoid cross-contamination, and certifying all service staff in appropriate service procedures as defined by the CDC’s COVID-19 guidelines. The Wellness Center is open Monday through Saturday, 6:00a.m. to 7:00p.m., and 6:00a.m. to 5:00p.m. on Sundays. Cafe V is open Monday through Saturday, 7:00a.m. to 2:00p.m. The salon hours of operation are 8:00a.m. to 2:00p.m. Monday through Friday. Naples Rehabilitative Services is available Monday through Friday by appointment. Upon arrival, guests are asked to wait at the front doors for a staff member to allow entry. Due to the close proximity of these services, guests are asked to wear a facial covering or mask worn over the nose for the duration of the appointment. Masks are available and will be provided to any guests in need. All Wellness Center and related staff members are exceeding sanitation guidelines set forth by state and local governments, as well as the CDC. Hospital-grade disinfectants, specifically made to kill the Coronavirus, are used in between appointments on all countertops, tools and common areas, and all staff members wear gloves and masks throughout their services. The current days and hours of operation for Vineyards Country Club’s dining outlets and amenity areas are as follows: Closed: Mondays (all). Mr. P’s Pub is open Tuesday through Friday, 11:00a.m. to 8:00p.m., and 11:00a.m. to 7:00p.m. on weekends, with brunch (a la carte) on Sundays from 11:00a.m. to 2:00p.m. The Acqua Pool Bar and Grill is open Tuesday through Sunday, 7:00a.m. until dusk, with lunch from 11:00a.m. to 3:00p.m., and lite fare, cocktails and takeout from 3:00p.m. to 6:00p.m. The Oakmont Dining Room is open for dinner on Fridays (only), 5:30p.m. to 7:30p.m. The cart barn and bag room is open from 7:00a.m. to 6:00p.m., with the driving range open from 7:30a.m. to 5:00p.m. The pro shop is open from 7:00a.m. to 5:00p.m. Locker rooms are open from 7:00a.m. to 4:00p.m. The Racquet Center pro shop is open from 8:00a.m. until noon. Tennis and pickleball courts are open from 8:00a.m. to 8:00p.m. Administration offices and concierge services are open Tuesday through Friday, 8:30a.m. to 5:00p.m., and 9:00a.m. to 2:00p.m. on weekends. For more information, call 239-353-1500 or visit vineyardscountryclubnaples.com. About Vineyards Country Club Vineyards Country Club is a 1,400-acre private, non-equity master-planned golf and country club community open to both residents and non-residents for more than 30 years. The family-owned community, founded in 1988, is located just east of Interstate 75 between Pine Ridge and Vanderbilt Beach roads and includes 2,719 homes in 38 individual gated neighborhoods, a 70,000-square-foot clubhouse, and 450,000 square feet of commercial space. The award-winning Club has been enhanced through three renovations since its original construction, with no member assessments. The Club offers 36 holes of members-only championship golf; a new, 15,000 square-foot Wellness Center & Spa with technologically advanced fitness equipment, five-star spa, salt water lap pool, smoothie café, and salt room; Racquet Center with 12 Har-Tru lite tennis courts, three lite gel cushioned pickleball courts, three regulation lite bocce courts, and year-round scheduled play; formal and casual indoor and al fresco dining; banquet, reception, meeting and event facilities; and one of Naples’ most active club social calendars. For membership or residential information, call 239-353-1500 ,  or visit the community’s Administration Office, located at 400 Vineyards Blvd., Naples. Yes, all members may bring accompanied guests to use the club facilities. The same accompanied guest may only visit the club six times per year. This does not include immediate family which is unlimited. The member may also sponsor a guest by requesting a guest pass, which will allow the guest to use the club’s amenities while unaccompanied. Do you offer a single membership? All memberships are considered single memberships. However, memberships include a spouse or significant other and unmarried children under the age of 25 at no additional cost. Can I upgrade my membership? Yes, the club allows members to upgrade any membership at any time by paying the difference in initiation fees and dues. What is the average age of members? The average age of our club members is 60 years old – and getting younger by the day! Do I have to live in the Vineyards community to be a member of Vineyards Country Club? While Vineyards Country Club is located within the Vineyards community, you do not have to live in the community to enjoy membership at the club. Approximately 75% of our members live within the community. How do you bill your dues? Annual dues are billed October 31st and are due in full by December 15th each year. Annual dues are prorated depending on your start date the first year of membership. How is Vineyards Country Club different from their competitors? 36 holes of golf, no assessments, easy tee time availability, unmatched amenities, no food & beverage minimums, family owned,
and debt free. Who owns Vineyards Country Club? Vineyards Country Club is privately owned by the Procacci’s, who are the original family who developed the community and built the club in 1988. The club is non-equity, and all initiation fees at the club are nonrefundable.
